channel.title: Large error need help
channel.description:
Well, yesterday my server was fine, i was playing on it getting new players on and all that jaz. I turn off my computer for the night (put it in sleep mode), wake up this morning, turn it on and go to log in and it says "error connecting to server". I look at the runserver, it says:
[code]Connection from 192.168.1.1:3675 Disconnecting bugged player null java.lang.NullPointerException at stream.createFrame(stream.java:36) at client.closeInterface(client.java:8321) at client.declineDuel(client.java:311) at client.logout(client.java:11073) at PlayerHandler.saveGame(PlayerHandler.java:378) at PlayerHandler.removePlayer(PlayerHandler.java:370) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:257) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) java.lang.NullPointerException at stream.createFrame(stream.java:36) at client.logout(client.java:11082) at PlayerHandler.saveGame(PlayerHandler.java:378) at PlayerHandler.removePlayer(PlayerHandler.java:370) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:257) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (192.168.1.1)[/code]
How could I go from fine to in trouble in no time at all? I tried restarting server and got the same thing. If anyone could help me I would greatly appreciate it.
EDIT: FIXED IT MYSELF, it was something to do with my playerhandler file, i replaced it with one of my backups and it works now.

item.title: Large error need help
item.dc:creator: @epic_demic epic_demic
item.description:
@epic_demic wrote:

Well, yesterday my server was fine, i was playing on it getting new players on and all that jaz. I turn off my computer for the night (put it in sleep mode), wake up this morning, turn it on and go to log in and it says “error connecting to server”. I look at the runserver, it says:

Connection from 192.168.1.1:3675 Disconnecting bugged player null java.lang.NullPointerException at stream.createFrame(stream.java:36) at client.closeInterface(client.java:8321) at client.declineDuel(client.java:311) at client.logout(client.java:11073) at PlayerHandler.saveGame(PlayerHandler.java:378) at PlayerHandler.removePlayer(PlayerHandler.java:370) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:257) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) java.lang.NullPointerException at stream.createFrame(stream.java:36) at client.logout(client.java:11082) at PlayerHandler.saveGame(PlayerHandler.java:378) at PlayerHandler.removePlayer(PlayerHandler.java:370) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:257) at process.run(process.java:23) at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:619) ClientHandler: Client null disconnected (192.168.1.1)

How could I go from fine to in trouble in no time at all? I tried restarting server and got the same thing. If anyone could help me I would greatly appreciate it.

EDIT: FIXED IT MYSELF, it was something to do with my playerhandler file, i replaced it with one of my backups and it works now.
